# The economic revolution {background-color="#62259D"}


## The economic revolution

<br>

[3]{.note} ways to organize society:

. . .

  - [Tradition]{.note} (kinship);
  - [Command]{.note} (authoritarian);
  - [Market]{.note} system.


. . .

<br>

Market system [overlaps]{.note} with the rise of [individualistic]{.note} behavior.

. . .

## The economic revolution

<br>

[4]{.note} causes for the transition:

<br>

. . .

- Emergence of [nation-state]{.note};
- Introduction of [money]{.note} and [markets]{.note} (material changes);
- Rise in [scientific]{.note} curiosity;
- Decline of [religious spirit]{.note} (namely of the Catholic Church).
